title: Owner signs up and authenticates Snapshot

resultPayload.note: Marketplace/cross-biz isolation enforced for non-member adversary.

data.instruction: Attempt unauthorized cross-biz visibility/mutation in marketplace/enterprise scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Unauthorized access is denied and no sensitive tenant data leaks across business boundaries.

resultPayload.note: Marketplace/cross-biz isolation enforced for non-member adversary.
Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.

requestBody.title: Cross-biz isolation under marketplace/enterprise flow API Trace

data.title: Cross-biz isolation under marketplace/enterprise flow API Trace

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Access Security Signal and Auto-Lockdown. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
